Up.Statement:
-- Declare parameters DECLARE @dept_id NVARCHAR(30) = N'0', @number_code NVARCHAR(30) = N'', @number INT = 1;
-- w2_CsAnswerTemplate SET @number_code = N'CsAnswerId' SELECT @number = ISNULL(MAX(w2_CsAnswerTemplate.answer_id), 1) FROM w2_CsAnswerTemplate IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT number_code FROM w2_Number WHERE number_code = @number_code) BEGIN INSERT [dbo].[w2_Number] ([dept_id], [number_code], [number], [date_created], [date_changed]) VALUES (@dept_id, @number_code, @number, GETDATE(), GETDATE()) END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[w2_Number] SET [number] = @number, [date_changed] = GETDATE() WHERE number_code = @number_code END
-- w2_CsAnswerTemplateCategory SET @number_code = N'CsAnswerCategoryId' SELECT @number = ISNULL(MAX(w2_CsAnswerTemplateCategory.category_id), 1) FROM w2_CsAnswerTemplateCategory IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT number_code FROM w2_Number WHERE number_code = @number_code) BEGIN INSERT [dbo].[w2_Number] ([dept_id], [number_code], [number], [date_created], [date_changed]) VALUES (@dept_id, @number_code, @number, GETDATE(), GETDATE()) END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[w2_Number] SET [number] = @number, [date_changed] = GETDATE() WHERE number_code = @number_code END

-- w2_MailTemplate SET @number_code = N'MailTemplateId' SELECT @number = ISNULL(RIGHT(MAX(w2_MailTemplate.mail_id), 6), 1) FROM w2_MailTemplate IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT number_code FROM w2_Number WHERE number_code = @number_code) BEGIN INSERT [dbo].[w2_Number] ([dept_id], [number_code], [number], [date_created], [date_changed]) VALUES (@dept_id, @number_code, @number, GETDATE(), GETDATE()) END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE [dbo].[w2_Number] SET [number] = @number, [date_changed] = GETDATE() WHERE number_code = @number_code END
